scripts.dev: concurrently "bun run dev:database" "bun run dev:rendering" "bun run dev:localization" "bun run dev:client" "bun run dev:ai"
scripts.start: concurrently "bun run start:database" "bun run start:rendering" "bun run start:localization" "bun run start:client" "bun run start:ai"
scripts.install:services: cd database && bun install && cd ../rendering && bun install && cd ../shared && bun install && cd ../localization && bun install && cd ../client && bun install && cd ../ai && bun install
scripts.build: bun run build:database && bun run build:rendering && bun run build:localization && bun run build:client && bun run build:ai
scripts.coverage:ai: cd ai && c8 --clean --reporter=lcov --reporter=text --reporter=html bun run start
scripts.coverage:database: cd database && c8 --clean --reporter=lcov --reporter=text --reporter=html bun run start
scripts.coverage:rendering: cd rendering && c8 --clean --reporter=lcov --reporter=text --reporter=html bun run start
scripts.coverage:client: cd client && c8 --clean --reporter=lcov --reporter=text --reporter=html bun run start
scripts.coverage:localization: cd localization && c8 --clean --reporter=lcov --reporter=text --reporter=html bun run start
